brand_identity.mission: Empower Costa Rican micro-entrepreneurs with a simple, trustworthy financial tool.
brand_identity.archetype: The Organic & Earthy (Archetype 1) + The Performance Pro (Archetype 2 - Simplified)
brand_identity.target_audience: Small business owners (pulperías, sodas, independent vendors) in Costa Rica.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and KPI values.

body.usage: Use for lists, forms, labels, and descriptions.

rules.usage: Use Primary Green for branding, headers, and primary actions. Use Secondary Terracotta for 'Call to Actions' that need attention (like 'Register Expense'). Use Warm Sand for page backgrounds to reduce eye strain.
rules.dark_mode: Avoid pure black. Use #0A0F0D (Deepest Green-Black) for backgrounds.
rules.contrast: Ensure text is always legible. Use #FFFFFF on Primary buttons. Use #2D3142 on Surface cards.

containers.card: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-[#1B4D3E]/10 p-5

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-[#1B4D3E] text-white hover:bg-[#123D31] transition-all shadow-md hover:shadow-lg h-12 px-6 font-semibold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: rounded-full bg-[#E07A5F] text-white hover:bg-[#C95D40] transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md h-12 px-6 font-semibold
buttons.outline: rounded-full border-2 border-[#1B4D3E] text-[#1B4D3E] hover:bg-[#1B4D3E]/5 transition-all h-12 px-6 font-medium
buttons.ghost: rounded-full text-[#4F5D75] hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-[#1B4D3E] transition-all h-10 px-4 font-medium

inputs.default: rounded-xl border-gray-200 bg-white/80 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#1B4D3E] focus:border-transparent h-12 px-4 text-base shadow-sm transition-all placeholder:text-gray-400
inputs.label: text-sm font-semibold text-[#2D3142] mb-1.5 block

cards.kpi: bg-white rounded-2xl p-5 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(27,77,62,0.08)] border border-[#1B4D3E]/5 flex flex-col justify-between hover:-translate-y-1 transition-transform duration-300
cards.transaction: bg-white rounded-xl p-4 flex items-center justify-between border-b border-gray-50 last:border-0 hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors cursor-pointer

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-gray-200 h-20 pb-2 z-50 flex justify-around items-center shadow-[0_-4px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)]
navigation.nav_item: flex flex-col items-center justify-center w-full h-full space-y-1 text-gray-400 hover:text-[#1B4D3E] data-[active=true]:text-[#1B4D3E] transition-colors

textures.grain: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay with 2% opacity on the main background to give it a 'paper' feel.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a mobile-first PWA. Ensure touch targets are at least 44px. Use the 'Suma' brand identity—clean, warm, and professional.
layout_rules: Use a fixed bottom navigation for the 3 main tabs: Pendientes, Registrar, KPIs.
The 'Registrar' button in the center should be visually distinct (larger or different color).
Use padding 'p-5' or 'p-6' for containers instead of 'p-4' to feel more spacious.
Round corners significantly (rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl) to feel friendly.
component_overrides: Customize Shadcn cards to remove the heavy border and rely on soft shadows.
Customize Shadcn inputs to be taller (h-12 or h-14) for better mobile typing.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it via Google Fonts or Fontsource.
accessibility: Add aria-labels to the bottom navigation buttons.

do_not: Do not use generic blue/purple gradients.
Do not use 'Inter' font for headings.
Do not make buttons too small.
Do not center-align long text blocks.
do: Show positive reinforcement (green colors) for income and neutral/warm for expenses.
